Title: The Line
Plot: Peter goes on a search. West convinces Claire to stand up to someone. Hiro struggles with his feelings for Yaeko. Suresh has more problems with the Company. HRG tries to locate more of Isaac's paintings. Alejandro doesn't trust Sylar.
Writer: Adam Armus, Kay Foster, Tim Kring
GuestStars: Dianna Agron, Elya Baskin, Cary-Hiroyuki Tagawa, Janel Parrish
